'''Beta 1.16.100.51''' is the second beta version for [[Bedrock Edition 1.16.100]], released on August 12, 2020,<ref>{{cite|url=https://feedback.minecraft.net/hc/en-us/articles/360047675171-Minecraft-Beta-1-16-100-51-Xbox-One-Windows-10-Android-|title=Minecraft Beta - 1.16.100.51 (Xbox One/Windows 10/Android)|date=August 12, 2020}}</ref> which brings more parity from {{el|je}}, changes the achievement screen, and fixes bugs.

== Changes ==
=== Blocks ===
'''[[Basalt]]'''
* No longer destroyed by [[ghast fireball]]s.
* Now take slightly more time to break.

=== Mobs ===
'''[[Dolphin]]s'''
* Now dry out at the same rate as ''Java Edition''.

'''[[Snow Golem]]s'''
* Shearing them now drops the [[pumpkin]].

'''[[Turtle]]s'''
* Now play a sound when they lay eggs.

=== Non-mob Entities ===
'''[[Experience orb]]s'''
* Will now float up in water.

=== Gameplay ===
'''[[Enchantment]]s'''
* If the player has the [[Mending]] enchantment on any items, XP will now always go to healing the items before going to the XP bar.

=== General ===
'''[[Achievement]]s'''
* Gamepad bumpers can now be used to switch tabs in the achievements screen.
* Tweaked the default focus on the tabs in the achievements screen.
* Added extra space between the end of the list and the "input legend" at the bottom.
* The achievement detail screen now shows "Completed on other platform" section.

'''Technical '''
* Item names of the format {{cd|minecraft:item.someitem}} no longer need the {{cd|item.}} portion and it will be ignored.
* Added Entity Movement Prediction.

== Fixes ==
'''Stability and Performance'''
* The game no longer crashes if a player opens a Shulker Box they're standing on after rejoining a multiplayer session ({{bug|MCPE-60856}})

'''Vanilla Parity'''
* Sea Turtles now play a sound when they lay eggs 
* Dolphins will now dry out at the same rate as they do in Java Edition; 120 seconds
* Undamaged Mending items will no longer prevent damaged Mending items from being repaired ({{bug|MCPE-80156}})
* Basalt can no longer be destroyed by Ghast fireballs ({{bug|MCPE-75252}}) 
* Basalt blocks now take slightly more time to destroy
* TNT no longer activates when a Redstone Torch is placed directly on it ({{bug|MCPE-81258}}) 
* Experience Orbs now float in water ({{bug|MCPE-64039}}) 
* Adjusted Netherite movement in lava ({{bug|MCPE-65372}}) 
* Trade discounts from Hero of the Village and Curing Zombie Villagers now match the Java Edition ({{bug|MCPE-70782}}) 
* Pistons can no longer be extended above the build height limit or into the void ({{bug|MCPE-37825}}, {{bug|MCPE-51067}})

'''General'''
* Grindstone no longer shows a result unless it changes the item ({{bug|MCPE-54256}}) 
* Water from bubble columns now flows as it should ({{bug|MCPE-36463}}) 
* Custom-named boats and minecarts will now save their name after placing and breaking. Their names will also be shown in the world ({{bug|MCPE-25845}}) 
* Smelted items (prior to 1.13) no longer contain incorrect damage values and can be stacked ({{bug|MCPE-54617}}) 
* Hostile mobs can now spawn in thunderstorms during the day ({{bug|MCPE-34409}}) 
* Shearing a Snow Golem now drops a carved pumpkin ({{bug|MCPE-66967}}) 
* Bees now leave their hive/nest after an allotted time in the End and Nether dimensions ({{bug|MCPE-58322}}) 
* Water now flows correctly near edges 
* Fixed a bug that could cause falling blocks to duplicate near a portal ({{bug|MCPE-68229}}) 
* Villagers no longer get locked into the wrong profession ({{bug|MCPE-62080}}) 
* Dragon Egg no longer disappears if placed on a pedestal and Ender Dragon is respawned ({{bug|MCPE-78400}}) 
* Music is no longer interrupted when entering the water in ocean biomes ({{bug|MCPE-76213}})
* Saplings will no longer incorrectly transform into a bee nest when next to a tree and flowers ({{bug|MCPE-80543}}) 
* Hoppers with containers above them can no longer collect dropped items ({{bug|MCPE-80555}}) 
* Gravity-affected blocks no longer break when their supporting block is moved by a piston ({{bug|MCPE-81106}}) 
* Podzol no longer generates below the top layer when spawning large spruce trees ({{bug|MCPE-71995}}) 
* Fixed an issue that caused rails to not be powered correctly along the x-axis ({{bug|MCPE-81987}}) 
* Turtles and Dolphins on land will now successfully move towards water ({{bug|MCPE-44918}}) 
* Compass items will now point in the correct direction when the player is in a boat ({{bug|MCPE-56876}}) 
* Mob's inactivity timer is now reset when closer than 50 blocks from the nearest player 
* Ghasts once again spawn in all light levels ({{bug|MCPE-85747}}) 
* Fixed Vex movement along the x and z directions ({{bug|MCPE-41879}}) 
* Blaze now switches between melee attack and ranged attack based on the distance from the player ({{bug|MCPE-45469}}) 
* Falling blocks now break after falling for extended periods of time ({{bug|MCPE-73124}}) 
* Name tags now work correctly again ({{bug|MCPE-65535}})
* Collecting fish with a bucket now works more consistently  

'''User Interface'''
* Fixed a visual issue where clicking to edit the text box in the NPC dialog would not show the caret (Education Edition Features)

'''Technical'''
* Fix for ItemDescriptors</onlyinclude>
